actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to return the ad valorem and specific duties on necktie imports to the levels in effect as of January 1, 1981 for a period of five years.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the duty on men's and boy's neckties. Declares that the column 1 duty rates shall be exempt from any staged rate reductions which have been proclaimed by the President before the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to return the ad valorem and specific duties on necktie imports to the levels in effect as of January 1, 1981 for a period of five years.
